body.name: LFOYOU Vanity Makeup Mirror with Natural Bamboo Stand, 1X/3X Magnification Double Sided 360 Degree Swivel Magnifying Mirror, 8 Inch Portable Table Desk Counter top Mirror Bathroom Shaving Mirror
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 26 mins
features: DOUBLE SIDED MAGNIFYING MIRROR - Double-sided Makeup Mirror design (a side 1:1，other side 1:3). 8 inches mirror to see a larger area of the face.

100% NATURAL BAMBOO BRACKET: Bamboo is elegant and environmentally friendly and superb paint process, the bamboo base and white trim with simple style, adding stylish and modern decoration to any room.
360° SWIVEL MIRROR - It can be rotated 360 degrees. You can adjust the mirror to any angle for great viewing, The makeup mirror provides a clear reflection from every angle.

PORTABLE & VERSATILE - This makeup mirror can be placed on any desk or table, on bathroom countertops, dressers, vanities, or even placed as a decorative piece. It is modern and elegant, and can also be used as a morning makeup handheld mirror or shaving mirror, etc.

PERFECT GIFT FOR YOUR BELOVED - As a gift for your mom, wife, best friend or somebody special. It is a best gift for your beloved. Exactly makeup look will send them beauty, make them more confident. This double-sided mirror helps you make sure everything on your face is exactly how and where it should be.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Makeup Mirror with Bamboo Stand - 360°Swivel This multifunctional mirror offers a double-sided design that flips between 1x and 3x magnification, the mirror can be adjusted to any angle according to the height of the table. Please place face 3-4 inches close to the magnifying mirror, otherwise it will show an inverted or blurred images.

Natural, Modern Minimalist Style LFOYOU bamboo vanity mirror bring a natural, modern style to any space while being durable and not rust. The inherent beauty of this natural material adds a clean contemporary touch to your home decor. Dimensions: 1.7 x 7.4 x 8.2 in Weight: 0.98 lb Materials: white matte plastic frame and bamboo Stand Features: 360°swivel, Double-sided 1x and 3x magnification, bamboo stand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Almost a 5 star review but not quite
reviews.reviewText: Love this mirror, I just wish the wood attachment fit better. If I rotate the mirror too much the fitting will most likely be too loose and will no longer hold. Great mirror though with nice price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aesthetic and useful !
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a minimal looking mirror for my desk. I tend to use it for makeup, skincare, etc… this one was literally perfect. The design is so simple and doesn’t feel distracting. One side is a normal mirror and the other side is magnified. It’s completely worth the price and I recommend this for everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine I guess
reviews.reviewText: The mirror itself is okay. If you can tell from the photo one side is warped. Not noticing when looking at it head on but still lame. I guess you get what you pay for. However, what really bothered me was the condition it came in. It seemed like they sent me a mirror that had been returned. It was filthy, covered in fingerprints and smudged, and there was no plastic cover over the mirrors themselves. The mirror was also dislodged from the holes in the wood to keep it in place but that was an easy fix. Yes it works as intended but still lame it arrived dirty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LFOYOU Vanity Makeup Mirror
reviews.reviewText: This LFOYOU vanity makeup mirror is cute. I like that it has a bamboo stand. It's sturdy, and it flips around to another side with a different magnification. I can see clearly in it, and it helps me to see better when I'm doing my makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: This was a nice addition to my sales booth at a recent craft fair. I make handmade paper bead necklaces and hair scrunchies, so people like to get a sense of how things look. It is compact yet large enough for a customer to see how a necklace looks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seems cheaply made. Arrived with the mirror piece falling out and the pieces that should allow the mirror to sit in the frame aren’t big enough, so the mirror can’t even be mounted. Plastic/mirror piece feels so cheap. Returning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice way to activate a light sensor
reviews.reviewText: I use the mirror to activate a motion sensor light in a closet. The closet light sensor was positioned in a bad spot, so the closet light never turned on when the closet door opened. Now, when I open the closet door, light reflects off the mirror, hits the light sensor, and turns the closet light on. Voila!Works pretty well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for me
reviews.reviewText: Better than the ones on the tall stem..
